error_description: Please check the report ID and try again.
phone_desc: This represents your primary business phone number.
business_desc: Having a website for your business enables potential customers to find more information about your services.
hour_desc: Provide your regular customer-facing hours of operation.
desc: Business description helps customers understand your services.
category_desc: Categories are used to describe your business.
photo_desc: Photos help customers visualize your business and services.
listing_reputation_description: Google reviews are important because they provide potential customers with insights and feedback from other customers, which can influence their decision to use your business. They also improve your visibility and search ranking on Google.
listing_presence_description: Your Google Business Profile emerges precisely when people are seeking your business or similar ones on Google Search or Maps. With Google Business Profile, managing and enhancing your Business Profile is simple, enabling you to distinguish yourself and attract more customers.
top_categories_title: The top 3 categories used by competitors
top_categories_description: We found the following twenty businesses on the map that complicate your business. By analyzing and using this data, you can increase the chances of your business appearing higher on Google's search results and attracting more customers.
competitor: of competitors are utilizing this category.
top_keywords_title: The top 15 keywords used by competitors
top_keywords_description: These are the most common keywords found in competitor business names and descriptions. Understanding these keywords can help you optimize your business profile to improve visibility.
